articles.author: Luke Andrews
articles.title: Don't 'bash' Britain for having a bigger Covid outbreak than Europe, Oxford expert says - Daily Mail
articles.description: Official figures show the UK currently has one of the highest infection rates in Europe. But it is carrying out the third highest number of tests every day globally.
articles.content:
Professor Sir Andrew Pollard said it was not helpful to compare the UK's infection rate to other countries
It is unfair to 'bash' Britain for having higher Covid infections than the EU because it is… [+9448 chars]

articles.title: Joe Biden imposing new international travel vaccine rules, lifting restrictions - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The extraordinary U.S. travel restrictions were first imposed in early 2020 to address the spread of COVID-19. The rules bar most non-U.S. citizens who within the last 14 days have been in Britain, the 26 Schengen countries in Europe without border controls, …
articles.content: US President Joe Biden on Monday signed an order imposing new vaccine requirements for most foreign national air travelers and lifting severe travel restrictions on China, India and much of Europe ef… [+3943 chars]
